pr_title: AnalyzerTextOptions ctors changes and name suffix on properties

timeline.bodyText:
Two questions.

Should this and tokenizerName be final and only set in the constructor?
If we choose not to do #1 should the other value be set to null when using setAnalyzerName or setTokenizerName? Based on other code it appears these should be mutually exclusive.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText:
I have set the other one to null.
Also made tokenizerName and analyzerName final
replies.author: sima-zhu

timeline.message: Remove final to leave JavaDoc on setter
